name: Aem-script-console
tagline: Web based script console that integrates into the AEM touch UI interface and allows to create, save and execute groovy and JS scripts that interact with AEM and it's underlying CRX repository.
body:
### Support or Contact
Having trouble with the script console? 
The software is still work in progress but feel free to raise an issue or just contact me directly.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
